========================

--------------------------------

.. automodule:: cont_eval_proj.urls

cont\_eval\_proj.wsgi module
--------------------------------
Used for traditional synchronous deployments, primarily with web servers like Gunicorn, uWSGI, and Apache.

.. automodule:: cont_eval_proj.wsgi
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

cont\_eval\_proj.asgi module
--------------------------------
Used for modern asynchronous deployments, managing WebSockets, HTTP/2 and other asynchronous protocols with servers like Daphne and Uvicorn.

.. automodule:: cont_eval_proj.asgi
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
